content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining and Storage at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving coal from drill to chest

###Copper Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (28.0, -61.0) for copper ore
- Collection chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0) for smelting copper
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

###Iron Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0) for iron ore
- Collection chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0) for smelting iron
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

###Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation

###Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5) feeding assembling machine
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5) for automation science packs
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5) moving packs to output
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Additional storage chest (6.5, 14.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with coal supply
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Keep track of coal levels in mining drills and production facilities

### Errors with item extraction
- Verify target chest contains the desired items before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest position coordinates are correct when attempting to extract items

### Production line issues
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner inserters and mining drills
- Ensure proper placement of collection chests at mining drill drop positions
- Verify all components of production lines are properly fueled and connected

### Resource management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for power generation and burner equipment
- Monitor input/output chest inventories to prevent production bottlenecks
- Ensure proper material flow between production stages
